lines.text: We can definitely do a distraction to get some of them to turn away from us. At least we get a round in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get a surprise round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can make a little golden person dance behind that guy there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can get a surprise round on all of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Surprise round, get as many range and AoE spells off as we can?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: AoE? Surprise round? What are you talking about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be helpful!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use this planning moment to cast Armor of Agathys on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Spectral frost collects from the air on my armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, as a note to remind you from last time--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't give myself enough cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yeah, so keep that in mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Are you going to try your thing or should I try my thing first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is your thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I can try something! I can do a similar thing, have them see something behind them, but you can do the same thing. Yours are already cast, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not right now, no. But it's like that (snaps), it's easy, this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I could try to get one of them to fight with one of the other ones of them.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to sneak up, down the steps to that little crook in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Little further back, yeah. Is that all right? Do I have to roll or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. Okay, with disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you still have the gift?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you still have Blessing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so 26. That puts me within 30 feet of those guys, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what are they doing? Eating hearts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a piece and chucks it off to the side, and the two hyenas fight over it. Another one back there, you can see, is clutching a scapula, the back of a shoulder blade, and is breaking the bones in half and sucking the marrow out. At a quick glance, you get the sense that some of these may have been denizens of Alfield as of 24 hours ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start throwing up again soon, so let's either do this or backtrack, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they carrying anything on their bodies, on their person? Anything, canteens or weapons or equipment or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gnolls?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The gnolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of them have a longbow slung over their shoulder, and have a spear that dangles off to the side, or has been jammed in the ground next to them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's doing it, I'm getting ready. I'm doing this. I'm going to cast Mirror Image of myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Duplicity, or are you doing Mirror Image, the spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mirror Image.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's all agree that if this goes bad, we run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Suddenly, there are three me's around myself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we need to close it off, light the tip of that little wick and throw it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we going right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh God.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are any of them holding anything that they put down for a second, or they got it firmly in their claws?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that breaks and sucks the marrow out of one of the large, shoulder blade areas takes and grinds the teeth against it, scooping out whatever's inside, then throws that piece onto the ground next to it, then takes the arm and begins to splinter the middle of the arm bone and try to get the marrow out of that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to do your thing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you about to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. You tell me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to really quickly mutter a few arcane words, then there is another Caleb blinking in front of me a little bit and behind me a little bit. It is hard to see me at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you casting Blur or Mirror Image?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are those words?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to know for my own sake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't care.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get more into a place with Beau? In this crux, mirroring Nott. Stealth check? Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does your spell have concentration? You are concentrating on a spell at the moment. Beau, you quickly leap and land with no sound, catlike reflexes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three-point landing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your foot does slide for a second as you glance down, and where you stepped in, it looks like there's a bit of leftover pieces of people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I (gagging).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I whisper a couple words and use Mage Hand to pick up the little piece of shoulder blade he dropped and throw it in the face of the other guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It slowly lifts, and one of the other gnolls that's eating (splat), (growling), and the other one goes (yipping), and they go back to eating.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't care. Thought they would kill each other, I don't know. That was it. We're level three, that's all I got!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whoomp) A little halfling-sized person of light appears behind the gnoll at the far end there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is it? What are you using?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm using Dancing Lights. You can use the four lights to make a little person, a little humanoid shape of light. It is doing a little macarena behind the gnoll all the way. I have 120 feet of range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That spell is not concentration? Right, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is. But I would know that. I'm not going to do that, because of my keen memory that Caleb has, but not Liam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to turn around and whisper to Caleb: Are you going to do the thing? But I'm using Message, so no one can hear us. Are you going to do the thing? If not, I can do my thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I send Frumpkin through the chamber and down and starts battering into the walls here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as Frumpkin begins doing that, you watch as the one that's nearest on this side, the one that had dropped the arm piece earlier, takes the bow off its back and begins to notch an arrow, looking around. It's going to take a shot at the bird fluttering through. That is a 17. What's Frumpkin's--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure that hits. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of piercing damage. The bird goes (thud) on the ground and then dissipates. You watch as the four hyenas suddenly rush in towards where the bird had fallen, and they all go to the spot where it landed and find an arrow lying there, and (snarling and yipping).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Spiritual Weapon above the two gnolls directly in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range on that is--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Range on that is 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're placing it where? Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right there. It's going to giant lollipop down and smack one of them in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This one. The one on your left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll a spell attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, 19 plus whatever!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. Roll damage on that, that definitely hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is nine force damage, and that's my bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I can do a cantrip. For my action, I'm going to cast Sacred Flame at the same dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same dude? That is a 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He saves, so is it half, or--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of a check was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been his dexterity saving throw, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. "Must succeed," so it probably doesn't do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, then no damage. Okay, that ends your turn. Everyone else gets one action and then we roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I run down the steps and hide behind a barrel like it's going to make any fucking difference at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, who's up next?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, what you got?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you point to one of them that is not undead? Just looks like a regular gnoll, or I can just pick one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can pick one. All of the gnolls in here look like regular gnolls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great. Did you aim at that one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I aimed at the other one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'll take that far one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I focus and summon my falchion into my hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. It appears into your space in a burst of dull greenish-blue fire, and there you see it, dripping with salt water across its blade.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to cast Hex at that right gnoll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. That one is now hexed. You watch as the gore that's been dripping from the front of its body seems to roll up its torso in reverse before it slips into its armor and grasps itself, the darkened shadowed gore now holding it in place as the Hex curse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach back and fire Eldritch Blast into it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Plus 1d6.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six plus four, ten, 1d6, 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage. (explosion) That one immediately drops what it was eating as the blast slams into it, as it's confused by the wrapping of the Hex. As it reels and almost stumbles onto its back, its foot crushes one of the nearby skulls, and there you see this gaping wound in its chest where the armor's been sundered. There's a smoking plume of blackened, horrible, shaded smoke pouring from it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my distance to move over here, if I may?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can, there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I in your line of sight, Jester? Does anybody need that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nah, you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That works good there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 20 there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me go one more. That's good. Then can I reach in my bag and grab out, in my little pouch, grab out a handful out of my 1,000 ball bearings?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do have 1,000 ball bearings, I remember that. We had money. She bought a lot of fucking ball bearings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A lot of ball bearings! Can I take it and-- you know how you can take your pocket and flip it inside out? And have a bunch of ball bearings go (metallic clinking) across this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear hundreds of tiny metal clangs in succession as ball bearings begin to spray down the stairs and scattering across the floor of this central makeshift ritual room. As they run through the semblances of gore and the areas of the stonework that are exposed between, you have spent your action scattering.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that my action? Okay, I'm going to spend a ki point, and as my bonus action take Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. As soon as you empty those out, you get back and go into your defensive position, preparing for any sort of assault. Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The effect of that hasn't taken place yet, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ball bearings, in this moment, are now clattering down into the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did Fjord hit one successfully?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That same one? I am just going to Fire Bolt it. From yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire Bolt. That is an attack range guy, plus six that is a 15 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, just barely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The damage is seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage. The one that you had hexed suddenly goes up into flames with a (dying scream) and falls back onto the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll use my movement to back up about 15 feet just outside of the chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are just there. As the flash of red light arcs from his finger and lights up the path before it impacts and kills the gnoll, Caleb then steps back into the shadows, trying to get out of the way. Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I get a turn as well? Because I did the Mage Hand thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, but that technically did not initiate into a combat. It just bothered one of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mildly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A temporary inconvenience.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll send an arrow down into the one that Jester attacked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine plus your sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you were stealthed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rogue, best class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one (explosion). The bolt goes through the center of his forehead and embeds itself right up to the very back. You watch as it (dying scream) and falls into the ground over one of the piled corpse pieces it was tearing through. Becoming one with its meal. And then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crouch back and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a hide check to try and disappear back there. Stealth on that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Advantage, but disadvantage, so 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You did your thing. Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to creep out against the wall closest to me and try and hide in one of these coves. Over in the corner, as far as I can get into the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get right into the similar space as Nott there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say barely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since I'm too far away for anything too crazy, I don't have a good bonus action. I will use my Devil's Tongue, I'll use Vicious Mockery on the gnoll that's currently in between-- not the one that's-- actually, the one that's furthest from us, because he's going to be the archer, and in Infernal I'm going to say: I'm too disgusted to think of anything clever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled a natural one on its saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah, that's three psychic damage and he has disadvantage on his next attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. Now, everyone please roll initiative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20. Do I have to roll with disadvantage, is this dex or intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's technically a dexterity ability check so it would be disadvantage, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two, so six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so sad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, what did you get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry. So who else rolled a natural 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did, but I got a disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, yeah. But don't you have advantage with--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See how it helps out there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gnolls rolled a natural 18 plus one, so they're at 19. Gnolls are next.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the gnolls are next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys are at 17?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm shaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester got 13. Ten to five?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They hyenas are before Nott. Then we have Nott, then we have Fjord. Molly, you're at the top of the round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God, that's awful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, that's bad. I don't think I even fucking spelled it right. I think I botched that all across the board. I spelled it "Hyneas."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gets the idea across. The special hyena.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Hyneas!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got, Molly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get a little-- Oh, can I do this? No, I can't do that. Fuck. I know, I'm so sorry. I should have my shit together. How far (counting)? Oh god, that's too far to walk. I'm going to try and get one little crevice. Actually, I'm going to hold my position. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold your position?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold my position and use one more Tongue on one of the other guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Natural 20 on the saving throw, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, so no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (coughs) and I'm holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you had been the first to appear at this point and gather their attention. They both have disadvantage on the attacks. That is going to be an 11.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other is two 14s in a row, so it would be 18 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, hit. With disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 to hit, sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 17 is my armor class.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is with a bow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That's going to be ten points of piercing damage to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to cat-paw try to catch the missile with Deflect Missiles. What do I spend-- Oh, wait. Oh no, wait, this is a ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's a ki point to throw it back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, it's a ki point to throw it back, it's just a reaction. It's 1d10 plus seven. Nine plus seven, so 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch it in mid-air and reduce it to no damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking dope!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hold it out like a microphone and go--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, the one in the bottom of the ground, who is closest to you, grabs its spear off the side of the wall. (growling) Runs up the stairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it hit the ball bearings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolling its dexterity check to see if it can do so. It does succeed. It's a 15. It slips, but it manages to make its way up the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I laugh at it, as it comes at me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looks so stupid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to go ahead and reach out at you with that. It's going to be a 16?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hope we at least heard the Looney Tunes bongos (bongo noises).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After you drop the arrow, it comes up and you parry this one off to the side and go back into your defensive stance. That ends both of those's go there. Now, comes to Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can see from where I am, I can see Fjord and Beau with one of these things. I'm going to Fire Bolt right from where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it. Roll for attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it. Aw, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Aw, no."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It strikes part of the stone altar, splintering candle wax and pieces of remnant heart chunks, but no impact unfortunately on the actual gnoll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You going to stay where you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I will walk just inside the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you go, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't, but we rolled at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so Beau, you want to go with your action now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! I'm going to take my staff, I'm going to try and crack this guy on the back of his head where he is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus Christ al-fucking-mighty. 13? Does that hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you swing the bo back, trying to crack him in the head, it actually slips on one of the ball bearings you had left, and as it manages to catch itself, it falls out of range of your sweep of the bo. You're like, "Shit!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm my own worst enemy! I'm going to do a knee and a round kick-- Oh no, sorry. I can just do one. I'm thinking in advance. One kick with the knee!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want my dice bag?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slip on one of your own ball bearings on the second strike, and manage to catch yourself by grabbing the fur on the outside of the gnoll and using its body to right yourself, and then, "Ugh." It's a little slick and sticky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wipe my hand on Fjord really quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Have any of them been hurt yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That are standing? This one has been hurt a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to move my Spiritual Weapon over to the one on the ground, directly in front of Beau. Oh, I meant on the lower level. Yeah, and it's going to hit him! Whoa. 16 plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits, plus five hits even more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's nine points of force damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of force damage as the lollipop hits it in the back of the skull and it leans forward and grabs the back of its skull with this pounding, throbbing pain in its head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to use Toll The Dead on the one in front of Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So what does it have to roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has to roll a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And the range of that one is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that rolls a nine plus zero, nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! So he takes 1d12 necrotic damage! Two. It's a little bell this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a little bell. You watch as a little bit of blood comes out the side one of the hyena's ears.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like to think that your lollipop makes Candy Crush sounds when it hits people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, is the lollipop the flat kind or the round kind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm picturing the flat kind, so it can whack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the spiral kind? Gotcha. Are you going to move at all, or are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I make my mirror images be like-- I guess they're doing that because I'm doing that because they're my mirror images.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go! There is a whole dance number over there of multiple Jesters. The hyenas go now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings tune to "Single Ladies.")

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does succeed on his dex save. This one's going to attempt--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) If you liked it, then you should have put a ring on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaps up to there. Dexterity saving throw, does succeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez, there's a lot of them. That's a bigger one, it looks like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be one attack against Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa, it was effective!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage. That's a natural 20, and a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that does not hit, not at all. It's plus two. The hyena rushes up and lashes out towards you, and you just pop, slap it in the nose and it pulls back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nose punch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one goes, that is going to be a 15 plus two, 17?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That will hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Actually, it has advantage on the roll because of pack tactics. It didn't really help, let's see here. You take two points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one is going to attack you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It will take ten points of cold damage in return.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Which causes it to shatter into ice on the ground. It bites you and its snout (explosion) T-1000 style. It shatters into a million ice pieces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You lost a gnoll there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you've got a gnoll. You should have that looked at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you. The other one is going to take a strike at you. Natural 20, it's a critical hit. 20 and ten. That pack tactics is nasty. That means you, for dice wise, suffer eight points of piercing damage. It takes ten and it explodes into ice as well. Both of these hyenas rush up and strike and both in succession disintegrate into shards of ice across the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is the coolest spell ever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so hardcore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell is gone though, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end the hyenas' turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll lean out from behind Mollymauk's buttocks and rest the hand crossbow on his left cheek and fire--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I support.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --on the gnoll that's engaged with Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Firing. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) As you drunkenly try and aim in the direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's that bulbous butt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You almost pull the trigger twice, but you're aiming at Fjord and you're like, "No."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No advantage for engagement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're revealed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I was revealed. Okay. So I have to hide again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to find a way to obscure something's vision to you before you can hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, got it. Okay, I'll run up the stairs then and hide back near where Caleb is. Other side. And then hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll work. Go ahead and roll a stealth check as your bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I've cocked. Terrible. Nine plus eight is 17! Oh, wow, I'm so stealthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a rogue this go-round, man. All right, that ends Nott's turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it is my turn! Can I use my bonus action to move my Hex from my defeated foe to my new foe right in front of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and can I whip my falchion around and upstrike, just try and cut right through him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I whip my falchion back and forth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's only a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His AC's 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I say two-handed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to get in the habit of saying it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've got to say it. Two-handed, I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 1d10. That's a ten! Four-- that's 14 points of damage plus a d6, that's 15 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this one, that had already-- 15 points of damage, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still standing, but it's horribly wounded now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You fucked with the wrong one, son.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That end your turn, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, to the top. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run up to these two and join the fray up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First, I'm going to take a swing at the big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 16 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits! Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's-- just using my normal one for this one. That's eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. As soon as it rears from the attack, Fjord, you watch as in a flash the cloak billows of Mollymauk's arrival. As the cloak falls, you just watch as the gnoll's head just rolls off of its shoulders. You can see the blow that struck it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bonus action with the glowing sword goes down into the hyena.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, hot damn!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's an 11 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's its armor class. Hyena doesn't have a whole lot of armor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, and that's eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage. With the one strike, you turn around and look at the hyena. (whoosh) with the offhand and just carve right through it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With a flourish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, because that didn't have the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this one was the glowing one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the glowing one is your main hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it was my main hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then your offhand is the other one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, okay. I didn't know how that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what damage would it have been without the bonus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would have been four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You carve through, and it's wounded, but it's still (whimpering).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have flipped them if I'd known.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Couldn't you have attacked with your offhand first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, I would have flipped them if I had known.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to hit the one that didn't have much left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The idea is the bonus action attack happens as part of the attack action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure, I'll do it reverse next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries, you can keep that in mind next time. It's all good, you still beat the shit out of it with your offhand. So that ends Molly's turn. Those two gnolls in the back, this guy is going to back up as he attempts to make a dexterity save. Fails! So he falls prone, uses the rest of his movement to get back up, so he can only move ten more feet so he can't get that much further away. He's going to go ahead and take a shot, this guy is going to go ahead and pull back, he's out of the bearing range and begins making his way towards the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, one at you, one at Molly. They're not going to fire at you because you visibly caught one and dropped it in front of them like, "Fuck that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, damn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Fjord, that's going to be 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And against Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blood Maledict on that fucker.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings it down to a 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that don't hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end the gnolls' turn; Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I saw Nott dart in front of me and chuckle to myself, see Nott walk past, I'm going to walk forward and say: You are enjoying this too much, but okay. Can I see these two? You said they were backing away, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see this one. This one is technically being blocked by that central column.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right then, the diamond comes up, I spin it and little charges of electricity crackle around it, and I kick it out from my hand and it spirals through the room to that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your spell attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Grog! No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, Caleb, so rough tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Grog) Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two. Plus six is eight, did that do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It skitters off the central column and goes spinning out of control as the electrical sphere shatters against the stonework and dissipates the energy, absorbed by the surrounding stonework.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I was so eager that I actually came down the steps my full movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say I think we-- oh no, that's right, you're double.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to go there, I want to go to the bottom of the steps behind Mollymauk and Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Caleb's turn, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, okay. How far away is he? I'm having a hard time seeing. Can I close the gap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could say maybe he's about 30 feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I do some cool monk shit and do some wall running and leap and parkour and then get to this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. Make an acrobatics check for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Acrobatics?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can see this is going to end up with an Office parkour gif in your future.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Parkour! Oh, that's good! That's a natural 18 plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you run off the edge, the hyena takes a swing at you. That is going to be a 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel it snap at your heel, but does not actually grasp any of your body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My foot just taps his arm just a little bit and I leap off of his arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You push off of him, run across this wall, leap, hit this pillar, and then, using the momentum, leap and land right in front of the gnoll there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I'm leaping, I want to take the staff and come down and go (crack) with a slap. Double handed, piece of shit gnoll! Oh god, it's a two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the other one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was my eight-sided die. I'm trying to efficient my rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll both? Yeah. As you swing down, the gnoll manages to see you up in the air and side steps as you hit the stonework.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I scream as I come down the whole way going (screaming).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gnoll laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go (pop) and do a little jab, okay. That's an 18.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just slap him in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Damage on that one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's just a d4. Four, so eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage, nice! As it's laughing, (laughing, punch, growling) its jaw is dislocated and it snaps back into place. You see some of its teeth broke. It looks kind of dazed and hurt by it. It's looking pretty rough; it's taken some hits in the past. That's the end of your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He can't run anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say, "Don't laugh at my friend!" and I'm going to send my lollipop over and hit it in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll do it, 20 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get a good hit, lollipop!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if it's going to hit it. Eight plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? No, I'm afraid that will not hit. As the lollipop comes around the corner, it sees it coming, and moves to get Beau to intercede between the lollipop and itself. At that moment, you're like, "Oh, I can't quite--," and you end up withdrawing and not making the strike this round for fear of hitting Beau.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Toll the Dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so that's a wisdom save? That's six, no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Okay, seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage. As you release the surge of energy, the sound begins to vibrate in its ears as it (whimpering) and it reaches up as both of its eardrums burst on the sides of its head and it falls to one knee looking like it's completely ruined and dazed. And Beau, you have a moment to coup de grâce it. You (whack) and break its neck with one swoop of the bo. Combined, you both finish off that gnoll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's so cool. That spell is so cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck yeah, that was awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Toll the Dead is the bomb!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you want to move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hang out where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. End of Jester's turn. The hyenas. This hyena is going to move past--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does Fjord get an attack of opportunity on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attacking you, Fjord, that is a six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it doesn't hit! Thankfully.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Attacking you, Molly. That is a 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take two points of piercing damage as it snaps at you. Seeing that they're both beginning to glance about and see that their allies are starting to back away, and there's a lot of you up in this upper area, they're both going to attempt to break away with the rest--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm definitely going to take an attack of opportunity on that one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, both of you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to get that last gnoll before he leaves the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this main hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Main hand. This one is hanging on by a thread. It's the one you damaged last round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you carve that one. You?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 11 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're rushing, you both (whoosh) simultaneously strike back at it as they're attempting to flee and they stumble down the stairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we cheers swords?

lines.name: TALIESIN, TRAVIS
lines.text: Tink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. Their bodies stumble to the ground and end up-- it's weird because their bodies hit the ground, and the momentum carries them as they slide across the ball bearings, almost like they're lagging.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bad physics?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that-- kerning? Curling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finished the hyenas' round. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is on the way out of the room. The tide has turned, it's starting to see more and more of you appear at the top of the stairs as the hyenas and its friends are being destroyed. It's going to run.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm glad we still get shitty jokes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It immediately goes (cackling) and falls on the ground, on its back, and is now rolling with laughter. Laughter that is echoing through the halls and making its way through the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you worry. Fjord, kill him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You made it prone; it's harder to hit that way!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get closer!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm trying! I would like to move up my 30 feet of speed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn behind me, I go: Watch the ball bearings! Watch the marbles!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you hear that just as you reach the bottom of the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) That's about as close as you can get on your 30 movement--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to move my Hex to the laughing gnoll on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll cast Eldritch Blast at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, make a concentration check. You've taken some damage, and I forgot to maintain your Hex's concentration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. That's right. Saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make two for me, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This first one is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. That's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second one is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine. The Hex moves over--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll remember that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whenever you take damage, and you have a spell that's concentration, you have to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These spell rules.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eldritch Blast?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Oh, sorry, plus six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage. Because it's still prone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's even higher, so 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Still misses, unfortunately. It hits and gleans off of its armor. However, it isn't quite strong enough to actually make a painful impact on its body and slams into the nearby rock, causing a spray of dust and debris.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The attack has to hit for Hex to work, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. All right. That ends your turn, Fjord. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run down the stairs the opposite direction from the ball bearings. I'll see where I can get, if I can get 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get, right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to also use Vicious Mockery again and yell: Shut up already!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That actually is a 16. What's your DC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC on that, it just says wisdom saving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Against whatever your spell DC is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where is my spell DC? Well, it's weird, I'm not a spell--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spellcaster technically. We will say for the purposes of this it's eight plus proficiency bonus which is ten plus whatever your charisma modifier is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My charisma modifier is zero.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Not a big deal. For now. We'll tighten it up. Cool. So no effect there. Molly's turn is over. The gnoll's turn. It is laughing its ass off. Now does it make--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The end of its turn it makes a save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Which is a 17. It manages to shrug off the laughter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At the end of its turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so it can't get up and move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go along the edge of the steps this way and come down toward it and I'm going to now spin and flames lick around it and I'll go (flick) and I flick that off my hand. This time is also not good. It is a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. It has disadvantage because it's still prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. For my attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Against ranged spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same thing. Rolled the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you release it and it just skids across the ground. Like skipping a stone across a lake. It slams into the wall behind it and (explosion).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I apologize.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's okay. No, I don't believe in any of that bullshit. You all are crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good, man. Just survive to level five and everything will turn. Unfortunately it does not hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to do this as my two-handed attack, but for flavor to skin it. I want to stroll up, channeling The Rock. Charge up the elbow. Then we go a People's Elbow. Come right down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage because it is prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just a full body weight (thudding). With advantage? Can I consider it a two-handed attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just getting your attack, so yeah, still with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! Why?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two and a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leap and right as you're in the air the gnoll kicks out of laughter. Rolls out of the way and you wham!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling in pain)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never recover from that injury.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, that shit just hangs out in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The worst funny bone pain shoots through your arm as you get up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are going to be rubbing Tiger Balm into that shit for years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your bonus. The gnoll actually starts laughing again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For flavor, my second attack isn't really an attack. I'm in so much pain I go (yell) and I kick a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because it's still prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will shut it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that your revenge hits are always really high. That's twice now that they've laughed at you and you've hit them while they're laughing at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every time I try to show off it never works. That's what I'm learning. Okay, three doubled to six plus four. So ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as it's laughing, you kick it in the head and you see it stunned on the ground for a second and its eyes kind of rolling in different directions. Nice heavy crack to the side of its temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't care too much. I just roll over and go fetal for a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, ending Beau's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to skip over across the upper level towards the far stairs so I can see it. I'm going to send my Spiritual Weapon over to it and smack it flat on the ground!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that does have advantage because it is technically in melee with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus Christ, I don't think either of them hit. 13 and lower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. It's just rolling out of the way of everything. It's doing what Beau did in the last fight, but on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to Toll the Dead. Wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unless it rolls a natural 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, I think that ends your turn, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hyenas are dead. There's no hyenas left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The proned-out gnoll is just making it through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Nott. Bring it home!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit down on the ground and-- all my Mirror Images do the exact same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau is over there going (gasps).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's almost something like a Jacob's Ladder moment, the end of his life is being stretched out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This gnoll is going to need some serious therapy. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's still prone, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's prone, yeah, so melee attacks have advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I walk up to it, and then point-blank shoot-- not point-blank, but far enough away that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're at disadvantage with a ranged attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll stand back ten feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you'll still get disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage from a ranged attack up close and disadvantage against a prone creature. Right now, with your crossbow, it's disadvantage regardless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well shit. Then I will draw a sword and I will--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Slap that bitch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now you've got advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you have advantage on the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your hands dirty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank god. Okay, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits. Go ahead and roll damage with your sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage. How do you want to do this? (cheers)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think, since it's on the ground, I would like to pin it into the ground, if I can, by finding the thinnest thing on it and jamming my shortsword into the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau's on the ground holding her elbow, the weapon misses, and it's rolling and cackling and starting to get up and you're like "Hmm, there!" (thump) Almost unceremoniously it's like (dying yip) and falls limp on the ground where you place it. It's almost like the slow push from Saving Private Ryan. You're like, "Shh, shh, shh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (dying yips) and it expires there on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go around and I collect the gnoll ears and I put them in the jar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As the room falls still, I say: Well, he had a good run. A toast to that guy right there on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cheers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One point of damage? All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone takes one point of psychic damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a question. How similar do hyena ears look to gnoll ears?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are noticeably smaller and not gnoll ears.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we said they were baby gnolls? I'm going to cut them off just to be safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Five sets of gnoll ears and four sets of hyena ears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to call Nott over to the chest over on that side there. Do you see anything wrong with this? Is there anything hinky about that chest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I check for traps. Checking for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is an intelligence check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you still intoxicated?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's investigation, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or has that shit worn off with some activity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next ten to 15 minutes or so, you'll be able to shake off the alcohol.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For now, I rolled an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does it look good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's totally good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take a step back. You've earned this. I will open it, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clunk) It's locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will pick it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and attempt, with disadvantage, to pick it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I rolling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's proficiency bonus, which is two, plus your dex bonus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the adrenaline pumps through your system, it wakes you up a bit and even with the intoxication that's been flooding your system, you steal a moment of clarity and it opens without an issue. You glance at it, and the chest looks like it's been bashed in a little bit, like one of the gnolls was trying to get into it and eventually gave up, got flummoxed, and threw it on the ground. As you open it up from the inside, you can see essentially a central medical pack, if you will. An emergency pack for any of the miners that had gotten hurt or wounded. There are two healer's kits in there. There are a number of disinfectant herbs and funguses. Anybody who is proficient in medicine would know how best to utilize those. I don't know if any of you are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find a small leather hand pack that contained four glass vials, three of which were shattered from the rough movements when it was tossed around, but one that is still intact. That contains a healing potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a healing potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is. It is a greater healing potion, not a standard healing potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hand it to Caleb. You need this more than all of us. You're the squishiest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's probably true. Thank you. You take the two medicine packs and then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I do with these? I don't, all right fine, I'll take them. I collect medicine packs now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need them. I could probably use those.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also like the idea of maybe giving the healing potion to the healer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can heal without the potion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you heal yourself without the potion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course she can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well all right then. That didn't really occur to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll keep the herbs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can mark down medicinal supplies, would be what you'd call it. You are not entirely certain as to how they are applied, but they are probably healthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look at them since I'm proficient in medicine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're proficient in medicine? Yeah. I was asking if anyone was proficient with it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, sorry. I was writing down gnoll sets of ears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Fair enough. The medicinal supplies you have acquired can be utilized to remove poisons, if quickly applied to where the poison was put. It has two uses. If an action is taken to apply it to a wound, whether a bite or a wound that was poisoned, it can help remove the poison.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an action you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to apply it, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a lot of gnoll chatter in here, and a lot of exploding orbs and stuff, so I'm going to guess that we have alerted whatever is beyond that we are here. How do we wish to proceed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, they make a lot of noise. They may not have noticed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I, since I'm in that general vicinity, go 20 or so feet into this hole and listen and see if I hear anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They don't send orbs of fire through the air, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step forward a little bit, make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the question? I'm sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was no question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some yipping, some conversation in whatever this gnollish language is. You hear a deep, resonant (deep breathing) and a distant (thump). An impact, and a sound near (yips). That's all. Sounded quite a ways away, like this echo had been traveling a ways down this tunnel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bend down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a few other cackling chuckles that echo shortly thereafter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around and come back to the rest of the group and say: There's something bigger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, could you give me a heal a little bit? I took a little bit of a beating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh sure. Yeah, I'll cast Cure Wounds on him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think there's something bigger at play here. Whatever is driving these gnolls I think is deeper in. Can I look around and see if I can find anything like any papers, anything from that humanoid that might be intelligible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking about the altar, you find some smaller pieces of fresher flesh that have been stretched over the edges of the altar, like on the corners. You can see a similar grin across the center. It's all blood splattered from the hearts that were placed on there. As you wipe a little bit of it away, you can see stained into this loosely tanned human skin the same symbol of the jagged smile. The jagged teeth that form a grin that the various tanned banners that are stapled into the stone walls show and reveal. But no notes. No books, no parchment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I try and figure out what this is, if I recognize this symbol in any way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd also like to join in on that with a religion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've already made a religion check before, and as you come up and join her, this particular symbol, the grin matches the memory, the flash you had of this entity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeenogru?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Yeenoghu.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeenoghu?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather this is probably the symbol that represents this entity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cult of Yeenogru.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeenogru or Yeenoghu?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeenoghu or what?

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeenoghu.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Magoo. Well, you know. Fake confidence.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you clear now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many fingers am I holding up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More than I think I have on my entire body. I think I just have four on each hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You good? Do we need to get out of here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm good. We're fine. I mean, is this the plan? We were supposed to free living people, but we got some arms. We could bring those back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think, I mean, yeah, we could, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did say to bring back anything we could find.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any identifiable body parts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Impacts and cackling and stuff. You get the sense that the tunnels deeper in have some activity amongst the gnolls that live below whatever they've converted this mine network to be. You also see that all the bodies in this chamber have been pretty much picked of any identifiable facets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jewelry, wedding bands, anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to take some time to really pick through it, you could try. Do you want to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we're still trying to get to people here. Our options are we press forward to something worse, or we backtrack and try the other direction, or we get out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have the silver thread up top, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did we? No, we opted not to do that for time's sake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could do it now. As we move forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it took a few minutes, didn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we could do that now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How are you feeling, Fjord?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Fjord, are we going to be Fjord Explorers or Fjord Escapes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I could do that quickly. I could put an Alarm here quickly. I could do it the fast way, and know if anything is coming behind us. Is that what we want to do? Do we want to go around? I don't know, I'm a little terrified of what is down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he does that, can we, no we can't take a short rest. It's not enough time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a half hour is a short rest. Or an hour is a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about an hour or so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. Ignore what I said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's two ways that I can do this. I can do it lickety-split or I can take my book out and do it the harder way, but that's ten minutes, about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's in front of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's real big.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just have to march into it. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not convinced that they don't still have people alive down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty much out of spells now. But that's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A short rest doesn't get us spells back, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not for her it doesn't. (singing) Conservation!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you with that sledgehammer on your back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're carrying a sledgehammer on your back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you with it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I don't know. It's a big weapon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got a badass scythe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's more of a tool sledgehammer than a weapon sledgehammer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I've got a scythe. A sickle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to volunteer that perhaps we move forward until we can see whether there are any living people that we can help and we make a decision then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw nothing that would clue me in as to what might be deeper and really big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing that caught your attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That went far better than the village, but also that big armored bastard wasn't there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case, maybe they think that they took each other apart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's set them up like they all were making out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we don't have time for that here. We have to get going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like some sort of a circle-jerky sort of a thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the way out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Loosely prop them up like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When we're victorious we can do disgusting things as we leave. Nott, I think you should take point again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you do the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That I thought that was for going back the other way. We want to know if something comes behind us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The reasons for doing that are slighter and I don't want to blow my wad magically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we were going the other way, I might.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go and be really smart and do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I drunk or am I not drunk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you were to take about ten more minutes, you'd stop being drunk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We talked for seven minutes, yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Wait for three more minutes and then go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you want to wait until Nott shakes off the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The booze?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The influence, the booze. Eventually, you regain--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While we wait for those three minutes I turn to Molly and I say, Do you remember anything in your recollections of this Yee...ah...noghu.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeenoghu.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yoplait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. Yoplait is a female deity? Or a male deity? Do you remember?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hard to remember. It's a lot of aggression, anger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm wondering with that whole, you know--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why are you curious about that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, the guy. The guy running the ceremony said that the hunger will be fed, "ours "and hers," right? I mean, that's what he said, right, DM? I didn't mishear that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I remember anything about either gender or that this would be-- Other than I just saw a lot of aggression and a feral aspect of this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just wonder who "hers" is. Who is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is the crux of the matter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shall we go find out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, you hear one sound that varies very strongly from the others that have encompassed this tunnel sequence. You hear this female scream, this high-pitched shrieking scream that says, "No! My baby!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no! This is what happens when we sit down and we talk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to go. Can't fuck around with mama deaths.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're moving forward as quickly as possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I charge ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys rush down the tunnel deeper into the maze of mineshafts--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll pick up on that next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whose baby? Where are they? Why were they crying? We'll find out next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's babies dying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, babies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) We fucked up the gnolls, fucked up the gnolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that our pickle jar is getting filled with little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Filled with pickled ears!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm smushing them down so that there's like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god! So it's actually briney pickled gnoll ears?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever had pickled pigs' feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we drank all the pickle juice out of it, so, really they just kind of have a pickle stink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're in their own juices.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a tip jar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it'll be an interesting, interesting learning process of conservation of spells as you progress down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I was saving them but then fucking Fjord asked for healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. That's okay. That's what cantrips are for. That's what weapons are for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I was using, cantrips.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm saying, something to keep-- as you continue forward if you need to assault things. All right. Oh, quick announcement which is fun, so we're going to have a guest next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. We are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our first guest of the campaign.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't know about this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah you did, I mentioned it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We knew this. We totally fucking knew this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know who it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, next week we'll be able to have on our show Khary Payton.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you've been watching The Walking Dead or Fear of the Walking Dead, he's been awesome. On that show for a long time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Teen Titan's Go!, plays Grimlock on Transformers, all over the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Phenomenal voice actor, great actor. We've been talking for a long time, he's been wanting to play in this for a long time, but he's been very busy, of course, those things, but he's in town and he'll be joining us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's so nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's such a teddy bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's fucking awesome. So we'll have Khary here next week. We're so excited to have him join us, and go give him a little love. He's actually at a Kansas City convention right now with Will Friedle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you're in that area over the next few days, you should go say hi and give him some Critter love or on the internet as well. So, yeah, excited to have him next week. In the interim, guys, have a wonderful week, we love you, thank you for joining us, and is it Thursday yet? Good night.
